Content-Type: text/plain; charset=ISO-8859-1

Hi,

Lastly, i started a crawling in java code. This is great, i thought there
are lots of features to optimize crawler. Order.xml, i used default version
of this ( i found that file  on sourceforge in /trunk folder. But i should
do same changes in crawler.

> I want to download just a page with text/html mimetype.
> Crawler should not look a link for mimetype controlling if that file ends
with .png,.gif,.bmp etc.
> Crawler pauses too much time between links ( my internet speed is high,
2.5MB/sec avg )
> I want to handle some specific tags for a page, for example i will insert
to db every <p> tag of page. ( by the way i wrote a jdbcwriterclass, i can
write to db instead of arc file )
...
...

I think that i can change this parameters in order.xml ( at least some of
them, maybe it should be written classes for some ). Are there any example
set of order.xml files?



-- 
A.Fuat Sungur
http://sungur.wordpress.com

--0016e6d7e035be008904877cab95
